I

IControl - Interface in crazyballrun.game.controls
The IControl is an interface for game controllers like the mouse and keyboard.
IControlFactory - Class in crazyballrun.game.controls
The IControlFactory provides a list of all implementations of the IControl.
IControlFactory() - Constructor for class crazyballrun.game.controls.IControlFactory
 
IControlObserver - Interface in crazyballrun.game.gui.interfaces
IControlObserver offers an interface for other gui controls to register for events (like Listbox-events: selection changes, scrollbar changes, ...).
IControlSubscriber - Interface in crazyballrun.game.gui.interfaces
Each class (usually used for GUIControls) implementing this interface may register at a IControlObserver by referencing its id (has to be in the same GUIFrame).
IListener - Interface in crazyballrun.game.controls
The IListener provides an interface for event-listeners of IControls.
IMAGE_FILE_EXTENSION - Static variable in class crazyballrun.game.GameConstants
File extension for image-files (have to support transparency!).
IMusicPlayer - Interface in crazyballrun.game.music.player
The IMusicPlayer encapsulates all necessary functions of a music player in the game.
incValue(int, Statistics.ValueType) - Method in class crazyballrun.game.level.Statistics
Increase the value of an attribute for a particular player by 1.
init() - Method in class crazyballrun.game.graphics.RenderThread
Initializes the screen (with the given resolution, color depth and refresh rate).
